mapper.select: SELECT F.AUTHORITY_STATE , F.ROLE_NO , F.ROLE_NAME , F.TYPE_NO , F.TYPE_NAME FROM ( SELECT DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY ROLE_NO) RN , E.* FROM ( SELECT C.AUTHORITY_STATE , A.ROLE_NO , A.ROLE_NAME , D.TYPE_NO , D.TYPE_NAME FROM ROLE A LEFT JOIN ROLE_AUTHORITY_TYPE B ON ( A.ROLE_NO = B.ROLE_NO ) LEFT JOIN AUTHORITY C ON ( B.AUTHORITY_NO = C.AUTHORITY_NO ) LEFT JOIN AUTHORITY_TYPE D ON ( C.TYPE_NO = D.TYPE_NO ) ORDER BY A.ROLE_NO, D.TYPE_NO, C.AUTHORITY_NO ) E ) F WHERE F.RN BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}

SELECT C.AUTHORITY_STATE , A.ROLE_NO , A.ROLE_NAME , D.TYPE_NO , D.TYPE_NAME FROM ROLE A LEFT JOIN ROLE_AUTHORITY_TYPE B ON ( A.ROLE_NO = B.ROLE_NO ) LEFT JOIN AUTHORITY C ON ( B.AUTHORITY_NO = C.AUTHORITY_NO ) LEFT JOIN AUTHORITY_TYPE D ON ( C.TYPE_NO = D.TYPE_NO ) WHERE A.ROLE_NO=#{roleNo} ORDER BY D.TYPE_NO, C.AUTHORITY_NO
SELECT TYPE_NO , TYPE_NAME FROM AUTHORITY_TYPE ORDER BY TYPE_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ROLE ( ROLE_NO , ROLE_NAME ) VALUES ( SEQ_AUTHORITY_NO.NEXTVAL , #{roleName} )

INSERT INTO AUTHORITY ( AUTHORITY_NO , AUTHORITY_STATE , TYPE_NO ) ( SELECT ( SELECT MAX(AUTHORITY_NO) FROM AUTHORITY ) + AUTHORITY_NO AUTHORITY_NO , AUTHORITY_STATE , ( SELECT TYPE_NO FROM AUTHORITY_TYPE WHERE TYPE_NAME = #{typeName} ) TYPE_NO FROM AUTHORITY WHERE ROWNUM < 5 )

INSERT INTO ROLE_AUTHORITY_TYPE ( ROLE_NO , AUTHORITY_NO ) ( SELECT R.ROLE_NO , A.AUTHORITY_NO FROM AUTHORITY A, ROLE R WHERE A.AUTHORITY_STATE = 'R' AND A.TYPE_NO = ( SELECT T.TYPE_NO FROM AUTHORITY_TYPE T WHERE T.TYPE_NAME = #{typeName} ) )
